Actions.Name: Channels: Get a list of news channels
Actions.Description: Get a list of news channels.

Actions.Name: Channels: Get a list of posts within the specified channel
Actions.Description: Get a list of posts within the specified channel.

Actions.Name: Channels: Send a post to specific channel
Actions.Description: Send a post to specific news channel.

Actions.Name: Media: Delete media
Actions.Description: Deletes the specified media in the current context.

Actions.Name: Media: Get all media
Actions.Description: Get metadata of all media that are accessible for the API token.

Actions.Name: Media: Get media by ID
Actions.Description: Get metadata for single media by its ID.

Actions.Name: Posts: Removes a post
Actions.Description: Removes a post from the system.

Actions.Name: Posts: Get a list of posts
Actions.Description: Get a list of posts that are accessible for the API token.

Actions.Name: Posts: Get a post by ID
Actions.Description: Requests the specified posts including a set of comments.

Actions.Name: Posts: Updates a post
Actions.Description: Updates a post, only changed field (incremental).

Actions.Name: User: Get list of users
Actions.Description: Get a list of users, depending on the API access token.

Actions.Name: User: Get user information
Actions.Description: Get specific user information by its user id.

Actions.Name: User: Invite user
Actions.Description: The user will receive an email to signup.

Actions.Name: User: Send a recovery email
Actions.Description: Sends a recovery email to the specified user.
